private int minDist = Integer.MAX_VALUE; // å…¨å±€å˜é‡æˆ–è€…æˆå‘˜å˜é‡

public void minDistBT(int i, int j, int dist, int[][] w, int n) {
  // åˆ°è¾¾äº†n-1, n-1è¿™ä¸ªä½ç½®äº†ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œçœ‹ç€æœ‰ç‚¹å¥‡æ€ªå“ˆï¼Œä½ è‡ªå·±ä¸¾ä¸ªä¾‹å­çœ‹ä¸‹
  if (i == n && j == n) {
    if (dist < minDist) minDist = dist;

}

public int minDistDP(int[][] matrix, int n) {
  int[][] states = new int[n][n];
  int sum = 0;
  for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j) { // åˆå§‹åŒ–statesçš„ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œæ•°æ®
    sum += matrix[0][j];
    states[0][j] = sum;
  }
  sum = 0;
  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) { // åˆå§‹åŒ–statesçš„ç¬¬ä¸€åˆ—æ•°æ®
    sum += matrix[i][0];
    states[i][0] = sum;
  }
  for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i) {
    for (int j = 1; j < n; ++j) {
      states[i][j] = 
            matrix[i][j] + Math.min(states[i][j-1], states[i-1][j]);
    }
  }
  return states[n-1][n-1];
}

private int[][] matrix =

private int n = 4;
private int[][] mem = new int[4][4];
public int minDist(int i, int j) { // è°ƒç”¨minDist(n-1, n-1);
  if (i == 0 && j == 0) return matrix[0][0];
  if (mem[i][j] > 0) return mem[i][j];
  int minLeft = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
  if (j-1 >= 0) {
    minLeft = minDist(i, j-1);
  }
  int minUp = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
  if (i-1 >= 0) {
    minUp = minDist(i-1, j);
  }
  
  int currMinDist = matrix[i][j] + Math.min(minLeft, minUp);
  mem[i][j] = currMinDist;
  return currMinDist;
}

public int minCoins(int money) {
if (money == 1 || money == 3 || money == 5) return 1;
boolean [][] state = new boolean[money][money + 1];
if (money >= 1) state[0][1] = true;
if (money >= 3) state[0][3] = true;
if (money >= 5) state[0][5] = true;
for (int i = 1; i < money; i++) {
for (int j = 1; j <= money; j++) {
if (state[i - 1][j]) {
if (j + 1 <= money) state[i][j + 1] = true;
if (j + 3 <= money) state[i][j + 3] = true;
if (j + 5 <= money) state[i][j + 5] = true;
if (state[i][money]) return i + 1;
}
}
}
return money;
}

private static int MIN_DIS = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
public static void minDisByBT(int i, int j, int[][] w, int n, int distance) {
distance += w[i][j];
if (i == n - 1 && j == n - 1) {
if (distance < MIN_DIS) MIN_DIS = distance;
return;
}
if (i < n - 1) {
minDisByBT(i + 1, j, w, n, distance);
}
if (j < n - 1) {
minDisByBT(i, j + 1, w, n, distance);
}
}

public int countMoneyMin(int[] moneyItems, int resultMemory) {

if (null == moneyItems || moneyItems.length < 1) {
return -1;
}

if (resultMemory < 1) {
return -1;
}

// è®¡ç®—éå†çš„å±‚æ•°ï¼Œæ­¤æŒ‰æœ€å°é‡‘é¢æ¥æ”¯ä»˜å³ä¸ºæœ€å¤§å±‚æ•°
int levelNum = resultMemory / moneyItems[0];
int leng = moneyItems.length;

int[][] status = new int[levelNum][resultMemory + 1];

// åˆå§‹åŒ–çŠ¶æ€æ•°ç»„
for (int i = 0; i < levelNum; i++) {
for (int j = 0; j < resultMemory + 1; j++) {
status[i][j] = -1;
}
}

// å°†ç¬¬ä¸€å±‚çš„æ•°æ•°æ®å¡«å……
for (int i = 0; i < leng; i++) {
status[0][moneyItems[i]] = moneyItems[i];
}

int minNum = -1;

// è®¡ç®—æ¨å¯¼çŠ¶æ€
for (int i = 1; i < levelNum; i++) {
// æ¨å¯¼å‡ºå½“å‰çŠ¶æ€
for (int j = 0; j < resultMemory; j++) {
if (status[i - 1][j] != -1) {
// éå†å…ƒç´ ,è¿›è¡Œç´¯åŠ 
for (int k = 0; k < leng; k++) {
if (j + moneyItems[k] <= resultMemory) {
status[i][j + moneyItems[k]] = moneyItems[k];
}
}
}

// æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€å°çš„å¼ æ•°
if (status[i][resultMemory] >= 0) {
minNum = i + 1;
break;
}
}

if (minNum > 0) {
break;
}
}

int befValue = resultMemory;

// è¿›è¡Œåæ¨å‡ºï¼Œå¸çš„ç»„åˆ
for (int i = minNum - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
for (int j = resultMemory; j >= 0; j--) {
if (j == befValue) {
System.out.println("å½“å‰çš„ä¸º:" + status[i][j]);
befValue = befValue - status[i][j];
break;
}
}
}

return minNum;
}

def minDistBackTrace(i, j, dist, w, n):
global minDist
dist += w[i][j]
if i==n -1 and j == n-1 :
if dist < minDist: minDist = dist
return

minDistBackTrace(i , j + 1, dist, w, n)

int minNum = Integer.MAX_VALUE;

/**
* ä½¿ç”¨å›æº¯æ³•è·å–ç»™å®šé‡‘é¢æœ€å°çš„ç¡¬å¸æ•°é‡ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨æ—¶numä¸º0
*
* @param coinVal
* ç¡¬å¸å€¼æ•°ç»„
* @param total
* æŒ‡å®šçš„é‡‘é¢
* @param num
* æ¯ä¸ªè§£æ³•æ‰€å¾—åˆ°çš„ç¡¬å¸æ•°é‡
*/
public void getLeastCoinNumByBackTracking(int[] coinVal, int total, int num) {
if (total == 0) {
if (num < minNum)
minNum = num;
return;
}
for (int i = 0; i < coinVal.length; i++) {
if (total - coinVal[i] >= 0) {
getLeastCoinNumByBackTracking(coinVal, total - coinVal[i],
num + 1);
}
}
}

/**
* ä½¿ç”¨åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’æ³•è·å–ç»™å®šé‡‘é¢ä¸‹æœ€å°çš„ç¡¬å¸æ•°é‡
*
* @param coinVal
* ç¡¬å¸å€¼æ•°ç»„
* @param total
* ç»™å®šé‡‘é¢
* @return ç»™å®šé‡‘é¢ä¸‹æœ€å°çš„ç¡¬å¸æ•°é‡
*/
public int getLeastCoinNumByDP(int[] coinVal, int total) {
// coinNumå­˜æ”¾çš„æ˜¯æ¯ä¸ªå¯¹åº”é‡‘é¢ä¸‹æœ€å°‘ç¡¬å¸çš„æœ€ä¼˜è§£
int coinNum[] = new int[total + 1];
coinNum[0] = 0;
//åˆå§‹åŒ–coinNumæ•°ç»„ï¼Œç¡¬å¸å€¼æ•°ç»„å¯¹åº”çš„å€¼çš„ç¡¬å¸æ•°é‡éƒ½ä¸º1
for (int i = 0; i < coinVal.length; i++) {
coinNum[coinVal[i]] = 1;
}

for (int i = 1; i <= total; i++) {
if (coinNum[i] == 0) {
int minTemp = Integer.MAX_VALUE; // è·å–æ¯ä¸ªiå¯¹åº”çš„æœ€å°ç¡¬å¸æ•°å€¼
for (int j = 0; j < coinVal.length; j++) {
if (i - coinVal[j] > 0) {
int v1 = coinNum[i - coinVal[j]] + 1;
if (v1 < minTemp) {
minTemp = v1;
}
}
}
coinNum[i] = minTemp;
}
}
return coinNum[total];
}

public class DynMoney {
private static int minNum = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
/**
* Sum(n) = Sum(n-1) + v * num
* @param sum å‡‘çš„æ€»é¢
* @param v é’±çš„é¢é¢
* @return
*/
public static int minMoney(int sum,int v[]) {
nextStep(0, 0, 0, sum, v);
return minNum;
}
/**
* @param n é’±çš„å¼ æ•°.
* @param c åˆ°é‚£ä¸ªé˜¶æ®µ
* @param cv å‡‘çš„é’±æ•°
* @param sum è¦å‡‘çš„é’±çš„æ€»æ•°
* @param v é¢é¢
*/
public static void nextStep(int n,int c, int cv,int sum,int v[]) {
//é‡‘é¢å‡‘å¤Ÿäº†
if (cv == sum) {
minNum = Math.min(minNum, n);
return;
}
//æˆ–è€…å‡‘åˆ°æœ€åé˜¶æ®µï¼Œæ²¡å‡‘å¤Ÿæ€»é‡‘é¢
if(c == v.length) {
return;
}
//æ¯ä¸ªé˜¶æ®µï¼Œé’±çš„å¼ æ•°ï¼Œå¼ æ•°åº”è¯¥å°ä¸ç­‰äº å‡‘çš„é‡‘é¢/é¢é¢
for(int j=0; j <= sum/v[c]; j++) {
if(cv + v[c]*j <= sum) {
//å½“å‰é˜¶æ®µå‡‘çš„ä¸è¶…é¢ï¼Œä¸‹é˜¶æ®µç»§ç»­å‡‘
nextStep(n+j, c+1,cv + v[c]*j, sum,v);
}
}
}

public static void main(String arg[]) {
System.out.println(minMoney(8, new int[]{1,3,5}));
}
}

private int coinPlan2(int[] coinTypes, int money) {
int[] dp = new int[money + 1];
Arrays.fill(dp, -1);
dp[0] = 0;

// æŒ‰ç…§ç¡¬å¸é¢å€¼æ’åº
Arrays.sort(coinTypes);
// å¤æ‚åº¦O(M * N), é€’æ¨å…¬å¼: f(n) = f(n - max(coinTypes)) + 1
for (int i = 1; i <= money; i++) {
// ä»å°é—®é¢˜å¼€å§‹è§£å†³ï¼Œé¿å…é‡å¤è®¡ç®—
for (int j = coinTypes.length - 1; j >= 0; j--) {
if (coinTypes[j] <= i && dp[i - coinTypes[j]] >= 0) {
dp[i] = dp[i - coinTypes[j]] + 1;
break;
}
}
}

// æœ€å°‘éœ€è¦å¤šå°‘æšç¡¬å¸
return dp[money];
}

/**
* æ±‚(0, 0)åˆ°(n-1, n-1)çš„æœ€å°å’Œ
*
* @param matrix äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„
* @param i å¼€å§‹çš„è¡Œåæ ‡
* @param j å¼€å§‹çš„åˆ—åæ ‡
* @param n æ•°ç»„é•¿åº¦
* @param length åˆ°è¾¾(i, j)èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„è·¯å¾„
*/
private void minLength(int[][] matrix, int i, int j, int n, int length) {
length = length + matrix[i][j];
if (j == n - 1 && i == n - 1) {
if (length < minLength) {
minLength = length;
}
return;
}

if (i < n - 1) {
minLength(matrix, i + 1, j, n, length);
}
if (j < n - 1) {
minLength(matrix, i, j + 1, n, length);
}
}

public static void minDistBt(int i, int j, int dist, int[][] a, int n) {
System.out.printf("%2d %2d\n", i, j);
if (i == n - 1 && j == n - 1) {
if (dist < minDist)
minDist = dist;
return;
}

if (i + 1 < n)
minDistBt(i + 1, j, dist + a[i + 1][j], a, n);

if (j + 1 < n)
minDistBt(i, j + 1, dist + a[i][j + 1], a, n);

}

private List<Integer> coinPlan(int[] coinTypes, int money) {
// ç¡¬å¸é¢å€¼æ’åº
Arrays.sort(coinTypes);
List<Integer> plans = new ArrayList<>();
boolean planRes = coinPlanCore(coinTypes, money, plans);
if (planRes) {
return plans;
}
return null;
}

private boolean coinPlanCore(int[] coinTypes, int money, List<Integer> plans) {
if (money == 0) {
return true;
}
if (money < coinTypes[0]) {
// ä½äºæœ€ä½é¢å€¼
return false;
}

// æŒ‡æ•°çº§æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦
for (int i = coinTypes.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
if (money >= coinTypes[i]) {
plans.add(coinTypes[i]);

money -= coinTypes[i];
boolean planCore = coinPlanCore(coinTypes, money, plans);
if (planCore) {
return true;
}
money += coinTypes[i];

plans.remove(plans.size() - 1);
}
}
return false;
}

public static void main(String... args) {
CoinMoney coinMoney = new CoinMoney();
System.out.println(coinMoney.coinPlan(new int[]{1, 3, 5}, 9));
System.out.println(coinMoney.coinPlan(new int[]{1, 2, 5, 8, 10, 50}, 399));
System.out.println(coinMoney.coinPlan(new int[]{1, 2, 5, 8, 10, 50}, 376));
System.out.println(coinMoney.coinPlan(new int[]{1, 2, 5, 8, 10, 50}, 1));
}

int[] coins = new int[]{1, 3, 5, 7, 9};

private List<List<Integer>> calMinCoins(int total) {
if (mem.get(total) != null && mem.get(total).size() > 0) {
return mem.get(total);
}
List<List<Integer>> result = new ArrayList<>();
if (coinSet.contains(total)) {
List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<>(1);
list.add(total);
result.add(list);
mem.put(total, result);

if (total < coins[0]) {
return Collections.emptyList();
}
int minCoins = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
Map<Integer, List<List<Integer>>> minCoinsMap = new HashMap<>();
//æ ¹æ®çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼Œæ¯ç§é¢é¢ï¼Œå‰”é™¤æ‰ä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œè®¡ç®—å‰©ä½™é¢é¢çš„æœ€å°å¼ æ•°ï¼Œæ”¾åˆ°coinMapä¸­
for (int i = 0; i < coins.length; i++) {

if (lists.size() > 0) {

minCoinsMap.clear();
minCoins = lists.get(0).size();
minCoinsMap.put(i, lists);
} else if (lists.get(0).size() == minCoins) {
minCoinsMap.put(i, lists);
}
}
}
if (minCoinsMap.size() >= 1) {
Set<List<Integer>> copySet = new HashSet<>();
minCoinsMap.forEach((minIndex, subCoins) -> {
for (List<Integer> list : subCoins) {
List<Integer> arrayList = new ArrayList<>(list);
arrayList.add(coins[minIndex]);
arrayList.sort(Integer::compareTo);
copySet.add(arrayList);
}
});
List<List<Integer>> copyList = new ArrayList<>(copySet);
mem.put(total, copyList);
return copyList;
}
return new ArrayList<>();
}

public static int knapsack3(int[] weight, int n, int w) {
int[] dp = new int[w+1];
int min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
if (weight[0] <= w)
dp[weight[0]] = 1;

for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
System.out.print(i + ":");
for (int j = 0; j <= w; ++j) {
if (j == 0 || dp[j] != 0 && j <= w - weight[i]) {
if(dp[j+weight[i]] != 0)
dp[j+weight[i]] = Math.min(dp[j+weight[i]], dp[j] + 1);
else
dp[j+weight[i]] = dp[j] + 1;
}
if(j == w && dp[w] != 0)
min = Math.min(min, dp[w]);
System.out.print(dp[j] + ", ");
}
System.out.println();
}
return min;
}

class SortClazz {

public static optionCell: number[] = [1, 3, 5];
public static storeVal: { [key: number]: number } = {};

public static getMinCount(targetVal: number): number {
let optionCell = SortClazz.optionCell;
if (optionCell.indexOf(targetVal) >= 0) {
return 1;
}
if (SortClazz.storeVal[targetVal]) {
return SortClazz.storeVal[targetVal];
}

let minArr: number[] = [];
for (let i = 0, leng = optionCell.length; i < leng; ++i) {
let tempVal = targetVal - optionCell[i];
if (tempVal > 0) {
minArr.push(SortClazz.getMinCount(tempVal));
}
}
let minVal: number = targetVal;
while (minArr.length > 0) {
minVal = Math.min(minVal, minArr.pop());
}
SortClazz.storeVal[targetVal] = ++minVal;
return minVal;
}

}

public class LeastCoin {

public static void main(String[] args) {
int[] coins = {1, 3, 5};
System.out.println(leastCoin(coins, 3, 9));

}

public static int leastCoin(int[] coins, int num, int limit) {
int[] states = new int[limit + 1];// è¦åˆ°è¾¾9ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å–çŠ¶æ€åœ¨[0,9]ä¹‹é—´

for (int i = 0; i <= limit; i++) {// åˆå§‹åŒ– -1 è¡¨ç¤ºä¸èƒ½æ»¡è¶³è¦æ±‚
states[i] = -1;
}
states[0] = 0;

for (int i = 1; i <= limit; i++) {
for (int j = 0; j < num; j++) {
if (i - coins[j] >= 0 && states[i - coins[j]] >= 0) {//è§’æ ‡ä¸è¶Šç•Œï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”å‰ä¸€ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€å¯è¾¾ï¼ˆæ¯”å¦‚ï¼ši = 9ï¼Œ4è¦å¯è¾¾æ‰èƒ½åŠ ä¸Š5ï¼‰
int count = states[i - coins[j]] + 1;//å‰ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼éœ€è¦çš„ç¡¬å¸æ•°åŠ  1
if (states[i] < 0 || states[i] > count) {// states[i] = -1,æˆ–è€…ä¹‹å‰è®°å½•çš„ç¡¬å¸æ•°æ¯”ç°åœ¨çš„è¦å¤š
states[i] = count;
}
}
}
}

return states[limit];
}

// è¿™ä¸ªå›æº¯æ³•ä¼šè¶…å‡ºæ—¶é—´é™åˆ¶
class Solution {
private:
int minDist = 10000;
void minDistBT(vector<vector<int>>& grid, int i, int j, int dist, int m, int n) {
if (i == 0 && j == 0) dist = grid[0][0];
if (i == m-1 && j == n-1) {
if (dist < minDist) minDist = dist;
return;
}
if (i < m-1) {
minDistBT(grid, i + 1, j, dist + grid[i+1][j], m, n); // å‘å³èµ°
}

if (j < n-1) {
minDistBT(grid, i, j + 1, dist + grid[i][j+1], m, n); // å‘ä¸‹èµ°
}

}

public:
int minPathSum(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {
int m = grid.size();
int n = grid[0].size();
int dist = 0;
minDistBT(grid, 0, 0, dist, m, n);
return minDist;
}
};

package life.arganzheng.study.letcode;

public class MinDist {

Integer minDist = Integer.MAX_VALUE;

public static void main(String[] args) {
int[][] matrix = new int[][] {
{1, 3, 5, 9}, {2, 1, 3, 4}, {5, 2, 6, 7}, {6, 8, 4, 3},
};
int minDist = new MinDist().minDist(matrix);
System.out.println(minDist);
}

public int minDist(int[][] matrix) {
visit(matrix, matrix.length, 0, 0, 0);
return minDist;
}

private void visit(int[][] grid, int n, int i, int j, int curDist) {
curDist += grid[i][j]; // è®¡ç®—å½“å‰çš„è·ç¦»

if (i == n - 1 && j == n - 1) { // å·²ç»åˆ°è¾¾ç»ˆç‚¹
if (curDist < minDist) {
minDist = curDist;
return;
}
}

// æœªåˆ°è¾¾ç»ˆç‚¹ï¼Œç»§ç»­éå†è®¿é—®
if (i < n - 1) { // å‘ä¸‹éå†
visit(grid, n, i + 1, j, curDist);
}

if (j < n - 1) { // å‘å³éå†
visit(grid, n, i, j + 1, curDist);
}
}
}

var minCountOfCoin = -1
// moneyè¡¨ç¤ºè¦ä»˜çš„é’±æ˜¯å¤šå°‘
func minCoins(money int) {
if money == 1 || money == 3 || money == 5 {

for i := 0; i < money; i++ {

// åˆå§‹åŒ–ç¬¬ä¸€é˜¶æ®µ

states[0][1] = true

states[0][1] = true

for i := 1; i < money; i++ {

if states[i - 1][j] {

states[i][j + 1] = true
}

states[i][j + 3] = true

states[i][j + 5] = true
}
}
}
}
}

var coinChange = function(coins, amount) {
// dp[i] å°±æ˜¯å‡‘æˆ i è‡³å°‘éœ€è¦å¤šå°‘ä¸ªç¡¬å¸
const dp = new Array(amount + 1)
dp[0] = 0
for (let i = 1; i <= amount; i++) {
coins.forEach((coin) => {
// æ‰£æ‰ä¸€ä¸ªç¡¬å¸ä¹‹åï¼Œå‰©ä¸‹é‡‘é¢è‡³å°‘éœ€è¦å¤šå°‘ä¸ªç¡¬å¸ç»„æˆ
const pre = i - coin
if (pre >= 0 && dp[pre] >= 0) {
dp[i] = Math.min(dp[i] || Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER, dp[pre] + 1)
}
})
// æ²¡æœ‰ç¬¦åˆçš„ç¡¬å¸å¯ä»¥å‡‘æˆé‡‘é¢
dp[i] = dp[i] || -1
}
return dp[amount]
};

è¯¾åä½œä¸šä»£ç ï¼ŒåŒ LeetCode é›¶é’±å…‘æ¢

/**
* é›¶é’±å…‘æ¢
* @param coins é¢å¸ç§ç±»
* @param amount æ€»é‡‘é¢
* @return int
*/
public static int coinChange(int[] coins, int amount) {
if(amount <= 0){
return 0;
}
Arrays.sort(coins);
if(coins[0] > amount ){
return -1;
}
int[] dp = new int[amount+1];
Arrays.fill(dp, -1);
// åˆå§‹åŒ–
for (int i = 0; i < coins.length && coins[i] <= amount; i++){
dp[coins[i]] = 1;
}
for (int i = coins[0]; i <= amount; i++) {
int j = 0;
while (j < coins.length && coins[j] <= i ){
if(coins[j] == i) {
dp[i] = 1;
break;
}
if (dp[i - coins[j]] != -1) {
if (dp[i] == -1){
dp[i] = dp[i - coins[j]] + 1;
}else {
dp[i] = Math.min(dp[i], dp[i - coins[j]] + 1);
}
}
j++;
}
}

return dp[amount];
}

let value = [3,4,8,9,6]

mem[i] = new Array(w+1).fill(-1) // mem[i][j]è¡¨ç¤ºç”¨i+1ä¸ªç‰©å“ç»„æˆé‡é‡ä¸è¶…è¿‡jçš„ç»„åˆæ‰€å…·æœ‰çš„æœ€å¤§ä»·å€¼
}
// çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹ä¸ºf(i, j) = max(f(i-1, j), f(i-1, j-weight[i])+value[i]), j>=weight[i];f(i, j) = f(i-1, j), j<weight[i]
function backpackDpRecur(i, j) { // è°ƒç”¨backpackDpRecur(n-1, w)
if(mem[i][j] != -1)
return mem[i][j]
if(i===0)
maxVal = j>=weight[0] ? value[i] : 0
else if(j===0)
maxVal = 0
else
maxVal = j<weight[i] ? backpackDpRecur(i-1,j) : Math.max(backpackDpRecur(i-1,j), backpackDpRecur(i-1,j-weight[i])+value[i])
mem[i][j] = maxVal
return maxVal
}

class func minimumCoins(to pay: Int, coins kinds: [Int]) -> Int {
// ä¸‹æ ‡ä¸ºä½¿ç”¨è¿‡æŸäº›ç¡¬å¸åå‰©ä½™çš„è´¹ç”¨ï¼Œå­˜å‚¨çš„æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨è¿‡çš„ç¡¬å¸çš„æ•°å­—å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
var coinNumbers = [String](repeating: "", count: pay + 1)

for value in kinds {

}

for _ in 1..<pay { // éå†1 ~ ï¼ˆpay - 1ï¼‰é
for i in 0...pay {// æ¢å¯»æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼
if coinNumbers[i] != "" {// éç©ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸ºæœ‰æ•ˆå€¼
for value in kinds {// ä¸ä¸åŒå¸ç§åšå‡æ³•
if value == i {// å‰©ä½™è´¹ç”¨ç­‰äºæ­¤åˆ»ä½¿ç”¨çš„ç¡¬å¸å¸å€¼
coinNumbers[i - value] = coinNumbers[i] + String(value)
return coinNumbers[i - value].count// è¿”å›å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦å³ä¸ºä½¿ç”¨çš„ç¡¬å¸æ•°
}else if value < i {// å‰©ä½™è´¹ç”¨å¾—å¤Ÿå‡æ‰ç®—æœ‰æ•ˆ
let step = coinNumbers[i] + String(value)// å‰©ä½™è´¹ç”¨å‡å»ç¡¬å¸å€¼åï¼Œæ‹¼æ¥æ–°ä½ç½®éœ€è¦å­˜å‚¨çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
let newStep = coinNumbers[i - value]// æ–°ä½ç½®åŸæ¥çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
if newStep == "" || newStep.count > step.count{// åŸæ¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸ºç©ºç›´æ¥å­˜å…¥æ–°å­—ç¬¦ä¸²,æˆ–è€…å–æ–°æ—§å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸­æœ€çŸ­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå­˜å…¥å¯¹åº”ä½ç½®
coinNumbers[i - value] = step
}
}
}
}
}
}
return pay
}

func CoinChange(coins []int, amount int) int {
status := make([]int, amount+1)
status[0] = 0
for i := 1; i < amount; i++ {
status[i] = -1
}

for a := 1; a <= amount; a++ {
min := math.MaxFloat64
for _, c := range coins {
if a-c < 0 {
continue
}
min = math.Min(float64(status[a-c]+1), min)
}
status[a] = int(min)
}

return status[amount]
}

*

public static int dpCoin(int change, int[] moneys) {
boolean[][] stats = new boolean[change + 1][change + 1];
//1.å¤„ç†ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡é€‰æ‹©
for (int i = 0; i < moneys.length; ++i) {
stats[1][moneys[i]] = true;
if (moneys[i] == change) {
return 1;
}
}

//2.çŠ¶æ€æ¨å¯¼
for (int i = 2; i <= change; ++i) {
//ä»ä¸Šä¸€å±‚çš„çŠ¶æ€æ¨å¯¼
for (int s = 1; s < change; ++s) {
for (int j = 0; j < moneys.length; ++j) {
if (stats[i - 1][s] && (s + moneys[j]) <= change) {
stats[i][s + moneys[j]] = true;
if ((s + moneys[j]) == change) {
return i;
}
}
}
}
}

return -1;
}

*
* f(0,0)

* f(2,1) f(2,2) f(2,3) f(2,3) f(2,4) f(2,5) f(2,4) f(2,5) f(2,6)

* ..........

* å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°é€’å½’æ ‘ä¸­ï¼Œæœ‰å¾ˆå¤šé‡å¤çš„ï¼Œè€Œé‡å¤çš„åˆ†æ”¯æˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦é€‰æ‹©ä¸€ä¸ªç»§ç»­æŸ¥æ‰¾å³å¯ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥å¼•å…¥å¤‡å¿˜å½•è¿›è¡Œä¼˜åŒ–ã€‚
*
* @param n å½“å‰å·²ç»é€‰æ‹©çš„ç¡¬å¸ä¸ªæ•°
* @param cur_change å½“å‰å·²é€‰ç¡¬å¸æ€»å’Œ
* @param change è¦æ‰¾çš„é›¶é’±
* @param moneys å¯é€‰çš„ç¡¬å¸é›†åˆ
* @param stats ä»¥é€‰çš„ç¡¬å¸æ•°å’Œç¡¬å¸æ€»å’Œ å¤‡å¿˜å½•
*/
static int nums = Integer.MAX_VALUE;

public static void coin(int n, int cur_change, int change, int[] moneys, int[][] stats) {
if (cur_change == change) {
if (n < nums) nums = n;
return;
}

if (stats[n][cur_change] > 0) return;
for (int i = 0; i < moneys.length; ++i) {
if (cur_change + moneys[i] <= change) {
stats[n][cur_change] = cur_change;
coin(n + 1, cur_change + moneys[i], change, moneys, stats);
}
}
}

public static int minCoin(int money) {
int[] dp = new int[money+1];
int[] arr = {1,3,5};
dp[1] = 1;
dp[3] = 1;
dp[5] = 1;
for(int i = 1; i <= money; i++) {
int min = 1000;
for(int j = 0; j <3; j++) {
if(i-arr[j] >=0) {
min = Math.min(min,dp[i-arr[j]]+1);
}
}
dp[i] = min;
}
return dp[money];
}

public int minComByDP(int[] item, int money) {

//çŠ¶æ€æ•°ç»„ï¼Œè®°å½•1~moneyéœ€è¦çš„æœ€ä½ç¡¬å¸æ•°
int[] min = new int[money+1];

min[i] = -1;
}

//æŠŠ1ï¼Œ3ï¼Œ5å¯¹åº”çš„çŠ¶æ€è®¾ç½®ä¸º1
for(int i : item) {
if(i <= money) min[i] = 1;
}

if(min[money] > 0) return min[money];

//é€’æ¨å…¬å¼ï¼šmin[n] = 1 + min[n-item[j]]
for(int n = item[0]+1;n<min.length;n++) {
if(min[n] < 0) {
for(int j = item.length - 1;j >= 0;j--) {
if(n - item[j] >= 0 && min[n-item[j]] > 0) {
min[n] = 1 + min[n-item[j]];
break;
}
}
}
}


return min[money];
}

class Solution {
public int coinChange(int[] coins, int w) {
int[] f = new int[w + 1];
//åˆå§‹åŒ–
f[0] = 0;
for (int i = 1; i < w + 1; i++) {
int min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
for (int c : coins) {
//å…¬å¼ï¼š f(i) = 1+ min{f(i-c)} , å‡è®¾ æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªcä¸º1ï¼Œåˆ™è¾¹ç•Œ f(1)=1+f(0);
// éœ€è¦åˆ¤æ–­ï¼š f[i - c] ä¸èƒ½æ˜¯é‚£ä¸ªé»˜è®¤çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¼šæœ‰æº¢å‡ºï¼š Integer.MAX_VALUE + 1 = Integer.MIN_VALUE !!
if (c <= i && f[i - c] != Integer.MAX_VALUE&& f[i - c] != Integer.MAX_VALUE) {
int fiPre = 1 + f[i - c];
min = fiPre < min ? fiPre : min;
}
}
f[i] = min;
}
if(f[w] == Integer.MAX_VALUE){
return -1;
}
return f[w];
}
}

public int coinChange(int[] coins, int amount) {
if(amount < 0) {
return -1;
}
int[] dp = new int[amount + 1]; // dp[i] æ€»é‡‘é¢ä¸ºiæ—¶ï¼Œæœ€å°‘æ‰¾é›¶çš„ç¡¬å¸é‡
Arrays.fill(dp, -1);
dp[0] = 0;
for (int money = 1; money <= amount; money++) {
int count = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
for (int coin : coins) {
if(money - coin >= 0 && dp[money - coin] != -1) {
count = Math.min(count, dp[money - coin] + 1);
}
}
if(count != Integer.MAX_VALUE) {
dp[money] = count;
}
}
return dp[amount];
}

int dynamic(int[] coins, int amount) {

// n*nçš„ç½‘æ ¼board
func minDistance(board [][]int, n int) int {
states := make([]int, n)
states[0] = board[0][0]
for i := 1; i < n; i++ { // åˆå§‹åŒ–ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œæ•°æ®
states[i] = states[i-1] + board[0][i]
}
for i := 1; i < n; i++ { // æ¨å¯¼æ¥ä¸‹æ¥çš„ç¬¬ i è¡Œæ•°æ®
for j := 0; j < n; j++ {
left := math.MaxInt64
if j - 1 >= 0 {
left = states[j-1]
}
up := states[j]
// é€’æ¨æ–¹ç¨‹
states[j] = min(left, up) + board[i][j]
}
}
return states[n-1]
}

public class Solution {
@Test
public void minCoinsTest() {
Assert.assertEquals(3, minCoins(9));
Assert.assertEquals(3, minCoins(11));
Assert.assertEquals(4, minCoins(12));
}

public int minCoins(int amount) {
if (amount < 1) {
throw new RuntimeException("amount should be large than 1");
}
for (int i = 1; i < amount + 1; i++) {
if (possible(amount, i)) {
return i;
}
}
throw new RuntimeException("this should not be happen");
}

/**
* å¯¹äºéœ€è¦æ”¯ä»˜çš„é‡‘é¢ï¼Œç”¨coinsä¸ªç¡¬å¸æ˜¯å¦å¯è¡Œ
*
* @param needToPay
* @param coins
* @return
*/
public boolean possible(int needToPay, int coins) {
//åªæœ‰ä¸‰ç§ç¡¬å¸ 1 ã€3 å’Œ 5 å…ƒ
if (coins == 1) {
return needToPay == 1 || needToPay == 3 || needToPay == 5;
}
if (coins * 5 < needToPay) {
return false;
}
return possible(needToPay - 5, coins - 1) ||
possible(needToPay - 3, coins - 1) ||
possible(needToPay - 1, coins - 1);
}
}

func dynamicZhaoLing(w: Int) -> Int {
var items = [Int](repeating: -1, count: w + 1)
items[0] = 0
let mianZhi = [1,3,5]

while items[w] == -1 {
for i in mianZhi {
var j = w - i

while j >= 0 {
if (items[j] != -1) {
if items[j + i] == -1 {
items[j + i] = items[j] + 1
} else {
items[j + i] = min(items[j] + 1, items[j + i])
}

}
j -= 1
}
}
}

return items[w]
}

func findChangeBacktrack(m int, coins []int, k, curr, num int, min *int) {
// é›¶é’±æ‰¾åˆ°äº†æœ€åä¸€ç§æˆ–å·²æ‰¾åˆ°ç¬¦åˆæ•°é‡çš„é›¶é’±

*min = num

// ä¸è¶³æ—¶ï¼Œå…ˆç”¨å½“å‰é¢é¢çš„é›¶é’±å‡‘é½
// å½“é¢é¢è¶³å¤Ÿæ—¶ï¼Œç®—ç®—è€—è´¹çš„çº¸å¸æ•°ï¼Œæ¯”æœ€å°çš„çº¸å¸æ•°è¦å°æ—¶è®°å½•ä¸‹æ¥(å‰ææ˜¯åˆšå¥½å‡‘é½é¢åº¦)

findChangeBacktrack(m, coins, i, curr+coins[i], num+1, min)

}
}

int[ ] record = new int[n+1];
public int findMinCoins(int n) {
if (record[n] > 0 ) return record[n];
if ( n == 1) return 1;
if ( n == 3) return 1;
if ( n == 5) return 1;
if ( n < 5 && n != 3 && n!= 1){
record[n] = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
return Integer.Max_VALUE;
}
int cout1 = findMinCoins(n-1);
int cout3 = findMinCoins(n-3);
int cout5 = findMinCoins(n-5);
int min = Math.min(cout1, Math.min(cout3,cout5));
if ( min != Integer.MAX_VALUE ) {
min = min + 1;
}
record[n] = min;
return min;
}

public static int[] coins = new int[]{3, 1, 5};
public static int TARGET = 9;
public static int state[] = new int[TARGET + 1];

public static int f1() {
//çŠ¶æ€æ•°ç»„åˆå§‹åŒ–
for (int i = 0; i < state.length; i++) {
state[i] = 0;
}
for (int i = 0; i < coins.length; i++) {
state[coins[i]] = 1;
}
for (int i = 1; i < state.length; i++) {
if (state[i] > 0)
continue;
int minPre = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
for (int j = 0; j < coins.length; j++) {
if (i - coins[j] >= 0 && state[i - coins[j]] > 0) {
minPre = Math.min(minPre, state[i - coins[j]]);
}
}
if (minPre != Integer.MAX_VALUE)
state[i] = 1 + minPre;
}

return state[state.length - 1];
}

public int minStep(int w) {
if (w == 1) return 1;
if (w == 3) return 1;
if (w == 5) return 1;
if (w <= 0) return Integer.MAX_VALUE;
return 1 + Math.min(Math.min(minStep(w - 1), minStep(w - 3)), minStep(w - 5));
}

# We need to initialize the first several values.

break

break
min_count_table[i] = min(min_count_table[i], min_count_table[i-coin] + 1)

ef findMinCoins_recursion(amount):
if amount in demonination:
return 1
if amount < 0:
return float('inf')
return min([findMinCoins_recursion(amount-coin) for coin in demonination])+1

private final int before6[] = {0,1,2,1,2,1};

public int minCoins(int money) {
if(money<6)return before6[money];

int[] dp = new int[money + 1];
for(int i=0;i<6;i++)dp[i]=before6[i];

for (int i = 6; i < money; i++) {
int c1 = dp[i-1]+1;
int c2 = dp[i-2]+1;
int c3 = dp[i-3]+1;
int min = c1<=c2?c1:c2;
min = min<c3?min:c3;
dp[i]=min;
}

return dp[money];
}

function getRow(count) {
const row = [];
for(let i = 0; i<count; i++) {
row[i] = 0;
}
return row;
}

function findMinCount(coins, money) {
const matrix = [];
matrix[0] = getRow(money+1);
matrix[0][money] = 1; // å‰©ä½™é’±æ•°æ ‡å¿—ä¸º1

while(true) {
const lastRow = matrix[matrix.length-1];
const newRow = getRow(money + 1);
for(let i = money; i>=0 ; i--) {
if (!lastRow[i]) { // ç»è¿‡ä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡æ‰¾é›¶ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰æ­¤å‰©ä½™é’±æ•°
continue;
}
for (let j = 0; j < coins.length;j++) {
newRow[i - coins[j]] = 1; // æ‰¾é›¶åï¼Œå‰©ä½™é’±æ•°ï¼Œæ ‡å¿—ä¸º1
}
}
if (newRow[0]) { // å‰©ä½™é’±æ•°å·²ä¸º0
return matrix.length;
}
matrix.push(newRow);
}
}

function main() {
const coins = [1,3,5];
const money = 9;
console.log(findMinCount(coins, money));
}
main();

public static int charge(int[] coinsValues, int w){
Arrays.sort(coinsValues); // ä¸åŒä»·å€¼ç¡¬å¸æŒ‰ä»å°åˆ°å¤§æ’åº

int[][] minCoins = new int[coinsValues.length + 1][w + 1];
for (int i = 0; i <= coinsValues.length; i++) {
minCoins[i][0] = 0; // wä¸º0ï¼Œç¡¬å¸ä¸º0åˆå§‹åŒ–
}
for (int j = 0; j <= w; j++) {
minCoins[0][j] = Integer.MAX_VALUE; // ç¡¬å¸ç§ç±»ä¸º0ï¼Œæ— èƒ½ä¸ºåŠ›
}

for (int j = 1; j <= w; j++) {
for(int i = 1; i <= coinsValues.length; i++) {
if (j < coinsValues[i-1]) { // ç¡¬å¸ä»·å€¼å¤§äºw
minCoins[i][j] = minCoins[i - 1][j];
continue;
}
// å– é‡‡ç”¨é¢åº¦ä¸ºjçš„ç¡¬å¸åæœ€å°‘ç¡¬å¸æ•° å’Œ ä¸é‡‡ç”¨é¢åº¦ä¸ºjçš„ç¡¬å¸åæœ€å°‘ç¡¬å¸æ•° çš„æœ€å°å€¼
minCoins[i][j] = Math.min(minCoins[i - 1][j], minCoins[i][j - coinsValues[i-1]] + 1);
}
}
for (int i = 1; i <= coinsValues.length; i++) {
for (int j = 1; j <= w; j++) {
System.out.print(minCoins[i][j] + " "); // å¾ªç¯æ‰“å°äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„
}
System.out.println();
}

return minCoins[coinsValues.length][w];
}

# æœ€å°‘ç¡¬å¸æ•°æ±‚è§£

'''
å‡è®¾ï¼š
W: é‡‘é¢
Vi: iç±»ä¸åŒå¸ç§ï¼Œi = 1,2,...n
coinï¼šè·å–é‡‘é¢ä¸ºWçš„æœ€å°‘ç¡¬å¸æ•°çš„å‡½æ•°

åˆ™çŠ¶æ€æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼š coin(W) = min(coin(W - Vi) + 1)
'''

V = [1,3,5]

# ç»“æœåˆå§‹åŒ–
init_result = {}
for C in V:
init_result[C] = 0

def coin(W):
#BEGIN

'''
è·å–é‡‘é¢ä¸ºWçš„æœ€å°‘ç¡¬å¸æ•°
:å‚æ•°ï¼š Wï¼Œé‡‘é¢
:è¿”å›å€¼: min_coins(æœ€å°‘ç¡¬å¸æ•°), min_result(ç¡¬å¸çš„åˆ†è§£ç»“æœ)
'''
global V
global init_result
min_coins = min_result = None

# å¯¹é‡‘é¢è¿›è¡Œåˆ†è§£
for C in V:
next_W = W - C

# é‡‘é¢ç¬¦åˆæŸä¸ªç¡¬å¸çš„é¢é¢
if next_W == 0:
min_coins = 1
min_result = init_result.copy()
min_result[C] += 1
break

if next_W < 0:
continue

curr_coins, temp_result = coin(next_W)

if curr_coins is not None:
curr_coins += 1

if min_coins is None or curr_coins < min_coins:
min_coins = curr_coins
min_result = temp_result
min_result[C] += 1

return min_coins, min_result
#END

def main():
#BEGIN

w = int(input('è¯·è¾“å…¥é‡‘é¢ï¼š'))

if min_coins is None:
print('æ— è§£')
else:
print('-'*10)
print('è‡³å°‘éœ€è¦ï¼š')
for r in min_result:
if min_result[r] > 0 :
print('é¢å€¼ä¸º{}çš„ç¡¬å¸{}æš'.format(str(r), str(min_result[r])))
#END

if __name__ == '__main__':
main()

//è°ƒç”¨æ–¹å¼ dp.dist(0, 0, matrix[0][0]);
public void dist(int i, int j, int dist) {
if (i == n-1 && j == n-1) {
if (dist < minDist) minDist = dist;
return;
}

if (i + 1 < n)
dist(i + 1, j, dist + matrix[i + 1][j]);

if (j + 1 < n)
dist(i, j + 1, dist + matrix[i][j + 1]);
}

private void backtrack(int[][] matrix, int cp, int i, int j, int n) {
if (i == n - 1 && j == n - 1) {
// åŠ ä¸Šç»ˆç‚¹ä½ç½®çš„å€¼åå†åˆ¤æ–­æ›´æ–°
if (cp + matrix[i][j] < shortestP) {
shortestP = cp + matrix[i][j];
}
return;
}
if (j + 1 < n) {
// åŠ ä¸Šå½“å‰ä½ç½®çš„å€¼åï¼Œå‘å³èµ°
backtrack(matrix, cp + matrix[i][j], i, j + 1, n);
}
if (i + 1 < n) {
// åŠ ä¸Šå½“å‰ä½ç½®çš„å€¼åï¼Œå‘ä¸‹èµ°
backtrack(matrix, cp + matrix[i][j], i + 1, j, n);
}
}

/**
* dp[amount+1]: min number of coins
*
* answer: dp[amount]
*
* dp[0] = 0;
*
* dp[n] = min(1 + (...dp[n-(coin in coins[n])]))
* @param coins
* @param amount
* @return
*/
private static int coinChange4(int[] coins, int amount) {
int[] dp = new int[amount+1];

Arrays.fill(dp, Integer.MAX_VALUE);
dp[0] = 0;

for (int i=1; i<dp.length; i++) {
for (int j=0; j<coins.length; j++) {
if (coins[j] <= i && dp[i - coins[j]] != Integer.MAX_VALUE) {
dp[i] = Math.min(dp[i], 1 + dp[i - coins[j]]);
}
}
}

return dp[amount] == Integer.MAX_VALUE ? -1 : dp[amount];
}

void pay_coins(int coin_index, int paying, int& counts) {
if(paying == 0)
return;

counts += paying / coins[coin_index];
paying = paying % coins[coin_index];

if(coin_index > 0)
coin_index --;
pay_coins(coin_index, paying, counts);
}

public int minDistance2(int[][] matrix){

private int minDistanceCore(int row,int col) {
if (row == 0 && col == 0) { // (0,0) ç›´æ¥è¿”å›å€¼
return matrix[0][0];

if (memo[row][col] != 0) { // è‹¥å·²è®¡ç®—åˆ™ç›´æ¥è¿”å›å¯¹åº”å€¼
return memo[row][col];
}
int distLeft = matrix[0][0], distUp = matrix[0][0];
if (col > 0) {
distLeft = minDistanceCore(row, col - 1);
}
if (row > 0) {
distUp = minDistanceCore(row - 1, col);
}
int curDist = matrix[row][col] + Integer.min(distLeft, distUp);
memo[row][col] = curDist; // è®°å½•å½“å‰è·ç¦»
return curDist;
}

static int minCoinNumByDP(int value, int[] mem) {
if (value <= 0) {
return 0;
}
if (value == 1 || value == 3 || value == 5) {
return 1;
}
if (value == 2 || value == 4) {
return 2;
}

if (mem[value] > 0) {
return mem[value];
}

mem[value] = 1 + Math.min(Math.min(minCoinNumByDP(value - 1, mem), minCoinNumByDP(value - 3, mem)),
minCoinNumByDP(value - 5, mem));
return mem[value];
}

static int minCoinNumByDPWithoutRecursion(int value, int[] mem) {
if (value <= 0) {
return 0;
}
mem[2] = 2; mem[4] = 2;
for (int i = 0; i <= value; i++) {
if (coins.contains(i)) {
mem[i] = 1;
}
if (mem[i] > 0 || i == 0) {
continue;
}
mem[i] = 1 + Math.min(Math.min(mem[i - 1], mem[i - 3]), mem[i - 5]);
}
return mem[value];
}

public int solution(int n) {
if (n <= 0) {
return 2;
}
if (mem[n] > 0) {
return mem[n];
}
if (n == 1 || n == 3 || n == 5) {
mem[n] = 1;
return 1;
}
int n1 = solution(n - 1) + 1;

int n3 = solution(n - 5) + 1;
int res = n1 > n2 ? n2 : n1;
res = res > n3 ? n3 : res;
mem[n] = res;
return res;
}

def findMoney1(m,n):
if m<1:
return 0

for i in range(len(n)-1,-1,-1):
if m == n[i]:return 1


f = [[0 for _ in range(m+1)] for _ in range(m)]

for i in range(len(n)):
if n[i] <= m:f[0][n[i]] = 1

for i in range(1,m):
for j in range(m):
if f[i-1][j] > 0:
for k in range(len(n)):
if n[k]+j <= m:
if f[i][j+n[k]]>0:
f[i][j+n[k]] = min(f[i][j+n[k]],f[i-1][j]+1)
else:
f[i][j+n[k]] += f[i-1][j]+1
f[i][j] = f[i-1][j]

return f[m-1][m]

middle=b<1?Integer.MAX_VALUE:array[b];

min_num = min_num<right?min_num:right;
return min_num;
}

public int minNeededCoins(int[] coins, int w) {
int[] dp = new int[w + 1];
for(int i = 1 ;i < dp.length; i++) {
dp[i] = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
}
for (int i = 1; i < w + 1; i++) {
for (int j = 0; j < coins.length; j++) {
if (coins[j] <= i){
int last = dp[i - coins[j]];
if(last != Integer.MAX_VALUE && last + 1 < dp[i])
dp[i] = last + 1;
}
}
}
return dp[w];
}

public void coinDynamic02(int[] coinItem, int resultMemory) {
// å±‚æ•°ä¸ºæ€»é‡‘é¢
int levelNum = resultMemory;
// é•¿åº¦ä¸ºè´§å¸æ•°å€¼
int length = coinItem.length;
int[][] status = new int[levelNum + 1][length];
// åˆå§‹åŒ–çŠ¶æ€æ•°ç»„
for (int i = 0; i <= levelNum; i++) {
for (int j = 0; j < length; j++) {
status[i][j] = -1;
}
}
// è®¡ç®—æ¨å¯¼çŠ¶æ€
for (int i = 1; i <= levelNum; i++) {
for (int j = 0; j < coinItem.length; j++) {
int coin = coinItem[j]; int result = i - coin;
if (result < 0) {// å¦‚æœå°äºé›¶,è¯´æ˜è´§å¸ä»·å€¼æœ¬èº«è¶…è¿‡äº† éœ€è¦çš„æ€»é‡‘é¢
continue;
} else if (result == 0) {// å¦‚æœåˆšå¥½ç­‰äº 0 è¯´æ˜è¯¥è´§å¸ä»·å€¼ == éœ€è¦çš„æ€»é‡‘é¢
status[i][j] = 1; // éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªè´§å¸
} else {// æ€»é‡‘é¢ - coin å»æ‰¾ ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªçš„æ€»é‡‘é¢ æ˜¯å¦æœ‰è´§å¸æ•°
int[] subStatus = status[result];
int min = -1; // æœ€å°‘çš„è´§å¸æ•°
for (int t = subStatus.length - 1; t >= 0; --t) { // æ‰¾åˆ°å¯ä»¥å‡‘æˆæ€»é‡‘é¢çš„æœ€å°‘çš„ç¡¬å¸æ•°é‡çš„ä¸‹æ ‡
if (subStatus[t] > 0) {
min = t; break;
}
}
if (min == -1) {// æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ° å°±ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
continue;
}
int num = status[result][min];
status[i][j] = num + 1;
}
}
}
// æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€å°çš„è´§å¸æ•°é‡
int i;
for (i = length - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
if (status[resultMemory][i] > 0) {
break;
}
}
if (i == -1) {// æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°
return;
}
int sum = resultMemory;// éœ€è¦çš„ç¡¬å¸æ•°é‡
int num = status[resultMemory][i];
System.out.println("éœ€è¦" + coinItem[i]);
for (int j = num - 1; j >= 1; --j) {
int coin = coinItem[i];
sum = sum - coin;
int t;
for (t = length - 1; t >= 0; --t) {
if (status[sum][t] > 0) {
break;
}
}
System.out.println("éœ€è¦" + coinItem[t]);
i = t;
}
}
